tool_description:
Image Processing with Sepia, Kodachrome, Brightness, Contrast, Invert, Skew, Grayscale, Color Blindness, Dither, Saturate, Lightness, Gaussian Sharpen, Polaroid, BoxBlur, Black & White, Bokeh Blur, Lomograph, Median Blur, Vignette, Hue, Histogram Equalization, Glow, Quantize, Pixelate, Gaussian Blur, OilPaint

Using Azure Front Door to take advantage of 118 edge locations worldwide and 4 instances in Europe, the US, Asia and Australia, this API’s average time is only 1.2s from post to the dow...

api_list.name: Alive
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://imgotron-image-processing.p.rapidapi.com/api/ImageEffect/status"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "imgotron-image-processing.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://imgotron-image-processing.p.rapidapi.com/api/ImageEffect/status"
